author: dain
msg: CMP container builder now propertly maps remove methods. This eliminates the ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in TransactionPolicyManager.
Handle and HomeHandle can not be copied with serialization on client side.
Added Handle copy tests to itest suite

msg: Implemented home remove methods from remote clients.
